idea_name: How to Spot a Fake Bank Text
idea_text: A video where your friend gets a scam text from a bank they don’t even use.
project_folder: storage/7_How to Spot a Fake Bank Text_20250711

assets.artwork_prompt: Create an animated scene featuring the character from the reference image, an expressive young woman with shoulder-length wavy hair, wearing a casual rust-colored t-shirt and dark trousers. She is seated at a cozy wooden table in a sunlit kitchen, surrounded by potted plants and soft pastel walls. The warm morning light filters through a nearby window, casting gentle shadows. The character is glancing at her smartphone with an amused yet puzzled expression, eyebrows slightly raised and a half-smile forming, as she reads a suspicious message claiming to be from an unfamiliar bank. Her body is slightly leaned forward, capturing her curiosity and disbelief. The scene captures a moment of everyday life, highlighting the absurdity and humor in receiving such scam texts, all while maintaining a light and airy atmosphere.
assets.artwork_path: storage/7_How to Spot a Fake Bank Text_20250711/artwork.png
assets.script: "Hey, I just got this weird text saying my account is suspended, but it's from a bank I don't even use. Looks like a scam! Always double-check before clicking on any links, and never share your info unless you're sure it's legit."

assets.srt_path: storage/7_How to Spot a Fake Bank Text_20250711/subtitles.srt
